sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些前置词均含"在……之间，在……之中"之意。
means: among ：指三者或三者以上的同类事物之间。
between ：多指两者之间，但现代英语中也可指三者或三者以上，表示彼此间清楚的独立的个体关系。
amid ：正式用词，侧重指在某个地方的中间或被某个东西包围着或在非同类人中间。
amongst与among同义，是among的变体。一般说来among总能替代amongst,而amongst则不然。

sentence.Network_en: He decided no assassin would chance a shot from amongst that crowd.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认定，没有刺客会冒险混在人群里开枪。

sentence.Network_en: An e-mail is already circulating amongst news staff calling for voluntary redundancies.
sentence.Network_cn: 在新闻部员工中已经在转发一封电子邮件,呼吁大家自愿裁汰.

sentence.Network_en: There had been a strike amongst British Airways ground staff.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国航空公司的机场地勤人员曾经举行过罢工。

Family is a common topic of conversation amongst friends ., 在朋友之间交谈时 , 家庭是最普遍的话题.

entry.def: Amongst means the same as among .

auth_sentence.content: Foremost amongst these has been the issue of suicide.
auth_sentence.res_content: Foremost amongst these has been the issue of suicide.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Foremost amongst these has been the issue of suicide.

auth_sentence.content: Key amongst Lennon's pieces is In My Life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Key amongst Lennon's pieces is In My Life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Key amongst Lennon's pieces is In My Life.

auth_sentence.content: Polls indicated the measure was gaining support amongst voters.
auth_sentence.res_content: Polls indicated the measure was gaining support amongst voters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Polls indicated the measure was gaining support amongst voters.

means.word_mean: (表示位置)处在…中, 为…所环绕, 为…所环抱

sentences.en: He was sitting amongst a group of children, telling them a story.
sentences.cn: 他正坐在一群孩子中间讲故事。

sentences.en: They earned a fortune amongst themselves.
The conference discussed, amongst other things, the problem of environmental protection.
sentences.cn: 除了其他问题以外，会上还讨论了环保问题。

means.word_mean: (表示范围)在…之内, 为…所分享[共有], 在…一类之中, 是…中之一, 在…群中

sentences.en: She is the tallest amongst her classmates.
sentences.cn: 她在她同学之中是最高的。

means.word_mean: (表示环境)与…在一起, 与…相处

sentences.en: My wife was there amongst others.
sentences.cn: 我妻子和其他一些人在那儿。

sentences.en: Unemployment amongst married women reached a peak.
sentences.cn: 在已婚女性中失业率达到了顶峰。

sentences.en: You must settle the matter amongst yourselves.
sentences.cn: 你们必须彼此商量, 自行解决这些问题。

means.word_mean: (表示所属)为…所特有; 为…所熟悉

sentences.en: This is a custom amongst the Germans.
sentences.cn: 这是德国人特有的习俗。
